title: EDI Custom Clearance Import System
shortDescription: A full-stack web app to streamline import job processing, documentation, and invoice tracking for a logistics client.
fullDescription:
This is a client-specific EDI Custom Clearance Import Management System developed for NG Pillai Logistics. The application handles end-to-end import job workflows including job creation, filtering, search, and invoicing. Key modules include:

- **Login & Auth**: Secure login with client-controlled credentials.
- **Job Querying**: Powerful search with filters like HAWB/MAWB number, invoice, container, transport mode (air, sea, land), and date ranges.
- **Job Creation**: Comprehensive input forms with fields for importer details, origin, BOE type, IGM info, custom house codes, and more.
- **Invoice Workflow**: Generates invoices with structured sections including supplier details, third-party charges, transaction summaries, item lists, duties (IGST, CESS), and other import-related charges.

The system is built to reduce manual documentation, prevent errors, and streamline clearance processes.
note: Private client project. GitHub repository not shared due to NDA and confidentiality policies.

title: ERP System – Import & Logistics Management
shortDescription: Client-specific ERP for inventory, approvals, and end-to-end logistics operations.
fullDescription:
This enterprise ERP solution was developed for NG Pillai to handle operations in their import and logistics workflow. The system features a dashboard, master data configurations, and an approval workflow with multiple checkpoints. Key modules include:

- **Dashboard**: Overview of job, invoice, and approval status post-login.
- **Master Data**: Management for currencies, countries, and other static datasets.
- **Checklist Workflow**: Creation, approval by managers, and verification by external parties.
- **BE/SB Updation**: Integration with customs data for Bill of Entry or Shipping Bill.
- **Tracking & Audit**: Internal tracking for each job.
- **Fund Request**: Structured module for requesting and managing funds within the job process.

This app is used internally by the client and cannot be publicly shared. Only screenshots are provided for demo purposes.
note: Private client project for NG Pillai. GitHub repository not shared due to NDA and internal use.

title: Supermarket Billing & CRM System
shortDescription: A role-based supermarket billing and CRM web app with GST-enabled invoicing.
fullDescription:
This is a full-featured supermarket billing system developed as a standalone web app using Tomcat for local deployment. It includes a built-in CRM to manage staff and customers efficiently. The system allows real-time stock tracking, bill generation, and administrative control over daily transactions.

Key Modules:

- **CRM Dashboard**: Track business operations with customer insights, staff stats, and stock analytics.
- **Customer & Staff Management**: Add, update, and manage user roles with permission-based access.
- **Billing System**: Create and edit GST-compliant bills with dynamic product selection and quantity updates.
- **Stock Control**: Monitor stock in/out flows, low stock alerts, and inventory balance.

The app runs on a local server and is optimized for individual shop owners needing centralized billing and customer tracking.
note: Client-deployed locally on Tomcat. GitHub repository not shared due to freelance restrictions.

title: Blood Bank Web App
shortDescription: Blood donor registry and search portal with login and profile management.
fullDescription:
This is a full-stack web application built to connect blood donors with seekers. The platform allows users to register as blood donors by providing their blood group, contact information, and location details. Once registered, users can log in to update their profiles.

On the home page, seekers can search for donors using filters like blood group, district, and state. The search results display a list of matching donors with their phone numbers, making it easy to get in touch directly for urgent needs.

Key Features:

- **Donor Registration**: Sign up with blood type, district, and contact details.
- **Login & Profile Edit**: Donors can log in and update or manage their profile info.
- **Search Functionality**: Users can search for available donors by location and blood type.
- **Real-time Listing**: Matching donors appear immediately with name and phone contact for fast access.
note: Freelance project for public service. GitHub repository is private.

title: Revive Musical – Billing & Repair Management Web App
shortDescription: Custom billing software for a musical instruments repair shop.
fullDescription: This web application was built for a local musical instruments repair shop to manage repair jobs, generate bills, and maintain customer records. Invoices are automatically generated with customer information and itemized charges.

title: Asir Matrimony
shortDescription: Matrimony web platform built for Tamil Nadu users with login-protected profiles.
fullDescription: Asir Matrimony is a regional matchmaking platform created for users in Tamil Nadu. It allows users to register, create detailed profiles, log in securely, and update their details.
